item.title: Pothole, 19th February
item.description:
2 pot holes reported this one which is nearest no 2 castleford and another near no 17 castleford but yesterday the one near no 17 has been filled but this one just left , there is also a massive one on the Cambridge green road / entrance to Castleford Avenue , there is also a massive one outside whyborne school which is Ivor grove road , seems to me money would be better spent doing all of these fixes together

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Castleford Avenue, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Potholes and uneven road at Bus Stop W, 19th February
item.description:
There are multiple potholes at Bus Stop W, along with the road being uneven. This constantly causes huge puddles, it’s almost impossible to wait for a bus without being splashed by vehicles. When the buses pull in they try to pull in slowly but you always have to step right back. It’s been like this for months and is getting worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, High Street, Goddington, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
